sourcesContent:
<template>
  <Form class="form">
    <input class="input" v-model="register.email" @input="updateAuthInputValue" type="email" placeholder="Email" />
    <input class="input" v-model="register.password" @input="updateAuthInputValue" type="text" placeholder="Password" />
    <button class="btn" @click.prevent="registerUser">Registration</button>
  </Form>
</template>

<script>
import { mapActions } from 'vuex';

export default {
  components: {
    Form
  },
  data() {
    return {
      register: {
        email: '',
        password: '',
      }
    };
  },
  methods: {
    ...mapActions({
      registerUser: 'auth/registerOrLogin',
      setAuthInputValue: 'auth/setAuthInputValue',
      setChangePage: 'auth/setChangePage',
      setRegisterOrLoginValue: 'auth/setRegisterOrLoginValue',
    }),
    updateAuthInputValue() {
      this.setAuthInputValue(this.register);
    },
  },
  mounted() {
    this.setChangePage('./login');
    this.setRegisterOrLoginValue('/register');
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>
</style>
